sourcesContent:
import { React } from "react"; import { Button } from "../ButtonElements"; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, ArrowForward, ArrowRight, } from "./InfoElements"; const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark, }) => { return (
{topLine} {headline} {description}
); }; export default InfoSection;
